TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Thailand, title = Thailand, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thailand} }

S.FORM: Thailand hya' ga cyux maki' tay 15 00 N, 100 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 513,120 sq km (maki' tay 51ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 510,890 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 2,230 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 68,200,824. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 41.20% , lhlahuy hya' ga 37.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 21.60%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Bangkok. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 5 na tay mawpuw sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Vajiralongkorn, aring ryax 13 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 2016 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Thailand hya' ga cyox maki' tay 15 00 N, 100 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 513,120 sq km (maki' tay 51ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 510,890 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 2,230 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 68,200,824. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 41.20% , lhlahoy hya' ga 37.20%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 21.60%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Bangkok. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 5 na tay mawpow sazing byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Vajiralongkorn, aring ryax 13 sqo byacing tay 10 sa kawas 2016 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
